Parameters.Name: DEVICE-4-1-6 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS DELETE ALL USERS

Test.TestName: SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS DELETE ALL USERS
Test.Name: Correct response: empty message on DeleteUsers
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS DELETE ALL USERS test when DUT return correct response (empty message on DeleteUsers).

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-4-1-6 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS DELETE ALL USERS
STEP 1 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Delete users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Try to restore current user
STEP 3 - Restore user 'admin' [Password: 3, Level: Administrator] Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: Server was unable to process request. ---> System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceTest.CreateUsersTest(SoapException, Int32Timeout, User[] User) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceTest.cs:line 2052 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.CreateUsers(User[] User) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 460 --- End of inner exception stack trace --- STEP FAILED
STEP 4 - Restore user manually STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.TestName: SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS DELETE ALL USERS
Test.Name: Correct response: fault on DeleteUsers (InvalidArgVal/FixedUser)
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS DELETE ALL USERS test when DUT return correct response (fault on DeleteUsers).

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-4-1-6 SECURITY COMMAND DELETEUSERS DELETE ALL USERS
STEP 1 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Delete users Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Subcode: InvalidArgVal Subcode: FixedUser Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.DeleteUsers(String[] Username) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 473 Allowed fault env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:FixedUser received STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Since fault has been received, check if no users were deleted STEP PASSED
Try to restore current user
STEP 5 - Restore user 'admin' [Password: 3, Level: Administrator] Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: Server was unable to process request. ---> System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceTest.CreateUsersTest(SoapException ex, Int32 Timeout, User[] User) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceTest.cs:line 2052 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.CreateUsers(User[] User) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 460 --- End of inner exception stack trace --- STEP FAILED
STEP 6 - Restore user manually STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED
